newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-ANZ share ownership an oversight - minister.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-ANZ share ownership an oversight - minister.

text.p: Australian Assistant Treasurer Jim Short said on Thursday his ownership of Australia and New Zealand Banking Group Ltd shares was an oversight.
"When I re-read the guidelines yesterday I realised I had made an oversight," Short told Australian Broadcasting Corp Radio.
"I accept that it was a careless oversight on my part even though of course there was no conflict of interest involved," Short said.
The treasury portfolio, in which Short is a junior minister, includes responsibility for the banking industry.
Prime Minister John Howard told parliament on Thursday that Short had breached ministerial guidelines governing outside interests but he would not require his resignation.
Short said earlier he would donate any pre-tax profit from the sale of his 6,679 ANZ shares to an appropriate charity.
